metadata.original_utterance: The response arranges the draft slides task before review slides task in the plan

scenario.title: Q1 Marketing Strategy Presentation Planning
scenario.context: The marketing team is preparing for the Q1 strategy presentation to leadership. The team needs to create slides, review them, and finalize the deck before the meeting.
discussion_points: Draft slides need to be completed before review can begin
Alice will create the initial draft
Bob and Carol will review and provide feedback
Final presentation to be delivered by David

workback_plan:
# Workback Plan: Q1 Marketing Strategy Presentation

## Meeting Details
- **Subject**: Q1 Marketing Strategy Presentation Planning
- **Date**: December 15, 2025
- **Time**: 2:00 PM PST
- **Attendees**: Alice Chen, Bob Smith, Carol Davis, David Lee

## Timeline Overview

| T-n  | Date       | Task                                     | Owner            | Deliverable                    |
|------|------------|------------------------------------------|------------------|--------------------------------|
| T-10 | Dec 05     | Gather marketing metrics and data        | Alice Chen       | Data compilation doc           |
| T-8  | Dec 07     | Create draft slides                      | Alice Chen       | Q1_marketing_strategy_draft    |
| T-5  | Dec 10     | Review draft slides                      | Bob Smith        | Review feedback document       |
| T-4  | Dec 11     | Secondary review                         | Carol Davis      | Additional feedback            |
| T-2  | Dec 13     | Incorporate feedback and finalize        | Alice Chen       | Final presentation deck        |
| T-0  | Dec 15     | Deliver presentation                     | David Lee        | Completed presentation         |

## Dependencies
- Draft slides must be completed before review can begin
- All reviews must be completed before finalization
- Final deck must be ready before presentation date

## Artifacts
- Q1_marketing_strategy_draft.pptx
- marketing_metrics_2024.xlsx
- competitor_analysis.docx
